author: Louise Boyle, Louise Boyle
title: Billionaire Tom Steyer responds to coronavirus backlash by planning a food bank
description: The 62-year-old spent more than $300m on his presidential bid which ended last month after he came third in the South Carolina primary
content:
Former presidential hopeful Tom Steyer has responded to criticism that he has been a no-show while a number of fellow billionaires publicly vowed to plough millions into fighting the coronaviruspandemic.
In an interview last week, Mr Steyer told The Independ… [+4414 chars]
